title: Cannot poll IMU sensor data
body:
Hi,

I am trying to poll sensor data from the IMU in the vehicle, but upon running vehicle.poll_sensors(),  there is a lua error.

My Code:
```
import mmap
import random
import sys

from time import sleep

import numpy as np
from beamngpy import BeamNGpy, Scenario, Vehicle, setup_logging
from beamngpy.sensors import GForces, IMU

# Instantiate BeamNGpy instance running the simulator from the given path,
# communicating over localhost:64256
random.seed(101)
setup_logging()
bng = BeamNGpy('localhost', 64256, home='D:/BeamNG')
# Launch BeamNG.tech
bng.open(launch=True)
# Create a scenario in west_coast_usa called 'example'
scenario = Scenario('west_coast_usa', 'example')
# Create an ETK800 with the licence plate 'PYTHON'
vehicle = Vehicle('ego_vehicle', model='etk800', licence='PYTHON')
imu = IMU()
vehicle.attach_sensor("IMU", imu)

# Add it to our scenario at this position and rotation
scenario.add_vehicle(vehicle, pos=(-717, 101, 118), rot=None, rot_quat=(0, 0, 0.3826834, 0.9238795))
# Place files defining our scenario for the simulator to read
scenario.make(bng)

try:
    # Load and start our scenario
    bng.load_scenario(scenario)
    bng.start_scenario()

    vehicle.poll_sensors()
finally:
    bng.close()
```

Lua Error:

![Screenshot 2022-06-16 120035](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13686695/174115495-21b611d3-85fa-4ec8-80e6-c6f55778af6f.png)

![Screenshot 2022-06-16 120059](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13686695/174115584-a59d4fe9-ffbf-4dd5-8103-403e161f18c9.png)

Thank you!
